    GenericRecord 

    public final class TextSpecInfoAtom
extends RecordAtom
    The special info runs contained in this text. Special info runs consist of character properties which don?t follow styles.(${t_18b631b2dad6430e82a2543c84183b53})
    Author:
    Yegor Kozlov
